title: I-821 | Application for Temporary Protected Status
description: If you believe you are an eligible national of a designated country or a person without nationality who last habitually resided in the designated country, use this form to apply for Temporary Protected Status (TPS).

filings.category: If you are filing for initial registration.
If you are filing for re-registration.

Additional Fees:Biometrics Services FeePayment for this fee may be made in the form of a single check or money order when also paying the initial registration fee, or as two separate checks or money orders.
